footer_navigation.disclaimer_desc: Always do your own research. Nothing here is financial advice. This is a meme coin. This is for the lolz.

banner.banner_text_1: Double the staking rewards. Double the Pepe. 100X the power!
banner.banner_text_2: Pepe was a prisoner, chained to his old, clunky Layer ONE server room. Until…

widget.not_enough_eth: Not enough ETH? Top up now

widget.max_token_exceed: Amount exceeds max tokens ({{maxTokensToBuy}}) to buy!
widget.transction_info: {{baseToken}} {{cryptoName}} tokens will be available for you to claim once the presale ends.
widget.waiting_approve: In order to buy {{cryptoName}} with USDT, you first need to authorize us to access the USDT in your wallet.
widget.view_transaction_info: Please click on the View Transaction button for more details.
widget.waiting_confirm: In order to buy {{cryptoName}} with {{tokenName}}, please confirm the transaction in your wallet. You may need to check the wallet app if you're on mobile.
widget.join_community: In the meantime, join our community
widget.presale_over: THE $PEPU PRESALE IS NOW SOLD OUT
widget.presale_over_desc: Claim and launch will go live 10am UTC, 30th June
widget.claim_desc: You can now claim your $PEPU tokens. Plus, stake your tokens to earn rewards! Add 0xadd39272E83895E7d3f244f696B7a25635F34234 to your wallet to see your $PEPU.
widget.claim_page_desc: $PEPU Claim is now live! Stake your claimed tokens below to earn rewards!
widget.just_claim: Just want to claim your $PEPU? Click here
widget.claim_help: In order to confirm your transaction, please check your wallet. Sometimes the wallet may not alert you when a transaction is submitted, however you should now see a transaction which you can sign in your wallet of choice. Please ensure your wallet has enough ETH to cover gas fees.
widget.enterAmount: Enter amount of tokens to stake
widget.bar_title_end: Last chance to buy before major exchange listings
widget.claim_live_desc: You can now claim your $PEPU tokens. Plus, stake your tokens to earn rewards! Add 0xadd39272E83895E7d3f244f696B7a25635F34234 to your wallet to see your $PEPU.
widget.less_eth_warning: You may not have enough ETH to claim. We recommend topping up your ETH balance before claiming.

wert.title: Wert Widget
wert.desc: Please wait while we are initializing the Wert widget.
wert.disclaimer: By continuing, you're purchasing {{token}} tokens. Your tokens won't be immediately deposited to your wallet. You'll be able to claim them on the claim date that will be announced at a later date. After you claim them, they will be deposited to your wallet.
wert.meme_token: $PEPU is a meme token, and is not an ETF in any way, shape or form.

staking.title: Welcome to $PEPU Staking
staking.desc: The distribution of $PEPU token rewards will occur at a rate of 608.82 $PEPU tokens per ETH block. These rewards will be disbursed over 2 years and will be claimable once claim goes live.
staking.withdraw_text: All staked tokens can be withdrawn 7 days after token claiming goes live, which will happen after the presale has concluded.
staking.pool_share: $PEPU staking rewards are distributed at a rate of 608.82 $PEPU per ETH block. Your percentage of the pool will determine what percentage of the 608.82 $PEPU tokens you receive.
staking.whitelist_now: The current presale round is open to whitelisted wallets only
staking.sold_out_desc: Due to unprecedented demand, Phase 1 is now over! Phase 2 is coming soon, so keep your eyes on the countdown and ready your wallets to pickup Mr. Krab ahead of the $PEPU  launch.
staking.stake_claim_success: Your tokens have now been staked. You can withdraw your tokens 7 days from when they were staked.
staking.stake_transction_info: {{stakeAmount}} $PEPU  tokens will be staked once the transaction completes
staking.stake_view_transaction_info: Please click on the View Transaction button for more details.
staking.stake_waiting_approve: In order to stake $PEPU , you first need to authorize us to access the $PEPU  in your wallet
staking.waiting_confirm_stake: In order to buy and stake your $PEPU  tokens, please confirm the transaction in your wallet. You may need to check the wallet app if you're on mobile.
staking.waiting_confirm_stake_2: All staked tokens can be withdrawn 7 days after token claiming goes live, which will happen after the presale has concluded.
staking.stake_waiting_confirm: In order to stake $PEPU , please confirm the transaction in your wallet. You may need to check the wallet app if you're on mobile.
staking.stake_popup_info: Unclaimed $PEPU  that was bought using ETH or ERC-20 USDT can be staked now. Please note that all early staked tokens can be withdrawn 7 days after token claiming goes live, which will happen after the presale has concluded.
staking.transction_info_stake: {{baseToken}} tokens will be purchased and staked once the transaction is confirmed.
staking.transction_info_stake_success: {{baseToken}} tokens have now been staked! Check the dashboard for details.
staking.claim_stale_help: Confirm the transaction in your wallet to stake your $PEPU now. This will automatically stake all of your $PEPU tokens. Tokens will be locked for 7 days after the claiming process goes live.
staking.claim_success: Congratulations! Your tokens have now been claimed! Check your wallet for your token allocation.
staking.claim_error_message: Something went wrong! Please ensure you have enough ETH to pay the gas fees, and try disconnecting and reconnecting your wallet.

popup.exploring_des: Your wallet is the gateway to all things Ethereum, the magical technology that makes it possible to explore Web3.
popup.ref_text: Copy your referral link below and send it to your friends. For every purchase made using this link, you’ll receive 5% of the purchase amount.
popup.change_chain_info: Are you sure you want to change?
popup.change_swap_text: If you purchase on {{mode}} during the presale, you won't be eligible for the {{apy}}% annual returns from staking. We recommend buying on Ethereum if you want to stake.
popup.wrong_chain: Wrong chain id! Please Connect to {{chainName}}
popup.switchNetwork: Switching Chain Failed. Please try to switch to chain {{chain_name}} manually.
popup.your_purchased_popup_info: Your total purchased tokens are all tokens purchased using the connected wallet. This includes all staked and unstaked tokens.
popup.install_app: Scan the QR code below on your mobile device in order to install the Best Wallet app.
popup.install_app_mob: Click the button below on your mobile device to install the Best Wallet app.
popup.hit_btn_connect: Hit the button below and use the QR code scanner in the Best Wallet app in order to connect.
popup.need_wallet: Need a wallet? Try Best Wallet!

about.desc: “WTF IS PEPE UNCHAINED AND WHY ARE MY PANTS OFF?”
about.para_2: The future of meme coins. A Layer 2 blockchain built for Speed, Security, Low Fees–and of course–Memes.

about.desc1: Congrats! You're early to the party! Buy and Stake now during Presale to max out your rewards before the price skyrockets!
about.text_desc: Better speed. Better gains. Same delicious Pepe flavor.

tokenomics.sub_title: The engine that makes the $PEPU machine run.
tokenomics.pre_title: To Build A Solid Foundation For The Future...
tokenomics.toke_title_1_desc: Takes an army to create and run a chain. This makes sure it runs smoothly.
tokenomics.toke_title_2_desc: Since rewards are DOUBLED on Layer 2, a fat stack is for staking rewards.
tokenomics.toke_title_3_desc: Ser, Pepe needs no marketing. But he’s gonna do it anyway. BIGTIME.

tokenomics.toke_title_5_desc: An allocation for the $PEPU Layer 2 chain.

roadmap.title: Pepe Unchained Roadmap
roadmap.pre_title: And Rewarded His legions Of Fans for their loyalty
roadmap.road_1_desc: The time has come for Pepe to take a giant leap into his ultra-based future. By inseminating the world with L2 technology, Pepe Unchained becomes an absolute Giga Brain. He’s now ready to release his rewards.
roadmap.road_2_desc: With a burning desire in his loins, Pepe Unchained erupts during presale, offering DOUBLE the staking rewards. This is an explosion of Pepe juice all over the blockchain.
roadmap.road_3_desc: Pepe Unchained's L2 blockchain launches at the end of presale, creating a shockwave through the meme coin world.

faq.title: Pepe Unchained FAQs
faq.faq_2: What is layer 2? Why is it better?
faq.faq_3: When will Pepe Unchained L2 Be Released?
faq.faq_4: When Can I Claim My Tokens?
faq.faq_1_desc: Pepe Unchained or $PEPU  is a better version of the Original Pepe. It is not only a token, but a Meme Coin ecosystem built for:
faq.faq_2_desc: Layer 2 is a layer built on top of the Ethereum Network that allows for faster, and cheaper transactions. This makes Pepe Unchained the World's first Pepe token on its own chain! Here’s why that matters:
faq.faq_3_desc: The Pepe Unchained Ecosystem is NOW LIVE!
faq.faq_4_desc1: technology, with tokens claimable once the presale has finished. At this stage, you will reconnect the wallet you used to buy, such as
faq.faq_4_desc3: also allows you to stake your tokens once you have claimed your tokens.
faq.faq_1_desc_1: Instant and low fee bridging between ETH and Pepe Chain
faq.faq_1_desc_4: Higher Volume Capacity — 100x faster than ETH
faq.faq_1_desc_5: Dedicated Block explorer to see all transactions on Pepe Unchained Layer 2
faq.faq_2_desc_1: Faster Speed: Transactions on Layer 2 are processed much quicker than on Layer 1. This means you can stake, trade, and interact with PEPE Unchained at lightning speed
faq.faq_2_desc_2: Lower Fees With fewer transactions clogging up the main Ethereum network, gas fees are substantially lower on Layer 2.

layer.title: Pepe Unchained
layer.desc1: Your gateway to Pepe’s decentralized world. Explore trading, bridging, staking, and more with ease. Join the community to stay up to date on all new features.
layer.para1: Swap tokens on our lightning-fast decentralized exchange.
layer.para2: Move between chains with Pepe’s secure bridge solution.
layer.para3: Follow transactions and verify everything with our block explorer.
layer.para4: Put your tokens to work and grow your assets through staking.
layer.para5: Join the revolution! Sign up to build on Pepe Unchained.
layer.more_para: New features launching soon! Stay tuned and be part of the journey.
layer.infoText: He Built His Own Chain: Pepe Unchained. A State-Of-The-Art Layer 2 Ecosystem

pump-pad.title: Pepe’s Pump Pad
pump-pad.desc: The all new meme coin launch pad that lets you launch your own meme coins in just a few clicks–right on Pepe Unchained L2! Don’t let your memes be dreams!
pump-pad.accordian_desc_1: Got an idea for a meme coin? Within two clicks you can launch your own without any coding knowledge.
pump-pad.accordian_desc_2: Developers cannot pull liquidity, as it is locked by default. Also, no buy and sell tax can be implemented. This protects traders from malicious activity and keeps trading fun.
pump-pad.accordian_desc_3: As the creator of a meme coin, you call the shots. Viral initiatives, community-building, profit-taking. You create it. You own it. Everyone wins.
pump-pad.accordian_desc_4: Pepe’s Pump Pad is bringing the pump.fun style 2 Click Meme Coin Launcher to the Ethereum network, leveraging Pepe Unchained L2 for low fees, and high speed. Let the FUN begin!
pump-pad.bottom_info: He then created a launch pad where memes are born

dev_update.title: Development
dev_update.desc1: Here's where you can keep up to date with all of the latest Layer 2 Ecosystem Updates!
dev_update.head1_title1: Pepe Unchained First Ever Dev Update!
dev_update.head1_para1: Pepe Unchained Layer 2 Ecosystem Is Set To Change The Course Of Meme Coins Forever!
dev_update.head1_para2: The Pepe Unchained team is delighted to be sharing this first Dev Update with you all, as we have wrapped up our presale and are in full Dev mode!
dev_update.head1_para3: The Meme Coin Game Changer – Pepe Unchained Ecosystem
dev_update.head1_para4: Meme coins are a growing, if not dominating, force in the world of cryptocurrency. And we believe they’re not only here to stay, but will be a force in the space as long as it exists. Before Pepe Unchained, meme coins felt a little…disconnected.
dev_update.head1_para5: Many chains were available: Solana, Ethereum, Base, BSC–but no single place existed that felt like it catered specifically to this niche, and gave the niche exactly what it needed. Speed, security, access, a thriving dev environment, and most importantly FUN.
dev_update.head1_para6: That’s where Pepe Unchained comes in. It is a Layer 2 Ecosystem purpose-built for meme coins. A place where meme coin degens and perma-bulls alike can find, create, trade, and of course PAMP their bags.
dev_update.head1_para7: Ecosystem Isn’t Just A Fancy Buzzword
dev_update.head1_para8: Pepe Unchained is actually an entire meme coin ecosystem. Here’s what we mean by that:
dev_update.head1_para10: Firstly, we’ve deployed our very own Ethereum Layer 2 that serves as the base of operations for our meme coin kingdom. Fast, smooth, cheap transactions, and extremely secure. Without this, there is no Pepe Unchained.
dev_update.head1_para12: Pepe Unchained is launching its own decentralized exchange where tokens can be seamlessly swapped, liquidity pools can be created, and bags can be pumped!
dev_update.head1_para14: A custom bridge where assets can be swapped between Ethereum Layer 1 and Pepe Unchained Layer 2. But wait, there’s MOAR!
